trans-unit.source: Provides workflow compilation options for the current compilation or validation task.
trans-unit.target: 为当前的编译或验证任务提供工作流编译选项。

trans-unit.source: This class can only be created on a scope basis, using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilationContext.CreateScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 只可使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilationContext.CreateScope%2A> 方法在范围基础上创建此类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService.CheckTypes" /> is enabled at the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否在当前范围上启用 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService.CheckTypes" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService.CheckTypes" /> is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用 <see langword="true" />，则为 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService.CheckTypes" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService.CheckTypes%2A> indicates whether the types in the workflow being compiled are checked against a list that allows or excludes types based on the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AuthorizedType.Authorized%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService.CheckTypes%2A> 指示是否对照一个列表检查所编译的工作流中的类型，该列表基于 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AuthorizedType.Authorized%2A> 属性的值允许或排除类型。

trans-unit.source: The workflow compiler options for the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 当前范围的工作流编译器选项。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilationContext" /> class at the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 在当前范围初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilationContext" /> 类。

trans-unit.source: The `serviceProvider` parameter is the general property bag for the scope; if it contains an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService> the context is set according to that service.
trans-unit.target: `serviceProvider` 参数是范围的常规属性包；如果该参数包含一个 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService>，则根据该服务设置上下文。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilationContext" /> that is available at the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 获取在当前范围可用的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilationContext" />。

trans-unit.source: The workflow compilation context that is available at the current scope, or <see langword="null" /> if no compilation scope is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 在当前范围可用的工作流编译上下文；如果未初始化编译范围，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of types that the compiler allows in compiled workflows.
trans-unit.target: 返回在已编译工作流中编译器允许的类型列表。

trans-unit.source: A list of types that the compiler allows in compiled workflows.
trans-unit.target: 在已编译工作流中编译器允许的类型列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the workflow compiler options <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService.Language" /> that is available at the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 获取在当前范围可用的工作流编译器选项 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService.Language" />。

trans-unit.source: The workflow compiler options programming language that is available at the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 在当前范围可用的工作流编译器选项编程语言。

trans-unit.source: Gets the workflow compiler options <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService.RootNamespace" /> that is available at the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 获取在当前范围可用的工作流编译器选项 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService.RootNamespace" />。

trans-unit.source: The workflow compiler options root namespace that is available at the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 在当前范围可用的工作流编译器选项根命名空间。
